name: Grey_Curl_Nailhead_Upholstered_Headboard
reviews: got this as a x-mas present for my daughter who wanted to make her room more grown up...she loved it and it looks awesome in her room, good quality and elegant....she is so happy. Thanks.
description:
Wavy lines and a welcoming design make the Curl headboard series a
selection of elegance. Upholstered in fine linen with a fashionable
nail button trim, Curl shows off the best of modern design with a
fluid style that speaks volumes. Made from particleboard with solid
wood poles, Curl makes it easy to curl up to while pleasantly
supported by this perfect centerpiece for your bedroom. Contemporary headboardFashionable curve designNail button trimFine linen upholsteringParticleboard and solid wood frameSet includes: One (1) Curl HeadboardMaterials: Frame: CARB Particleboard, Solid WoodFabric Material: LinenUpholstery color: GreyTwin dimensions: 3.5 inches thick x 40 inches wide x 51.5
  inches tallFull dimensions: 3.5 inches thick x 57 inches wide x 51.5
  inches tallStyleContemporary, ModernMaterialLinen, WoodTypeUpholsteredFinishGrey FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolid
